ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: They said, 'We are returning to our Lord.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: They answered: "We have (in any case) to go back to our Lord.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: They replied: 'We shall surely return to our Lord.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: The magicians said, "We will certainly return to Our Lord.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: They said, “We shall return to our Lord.”
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: They said: "Verily, we are returning to our Lord."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: They said: Surely to our Lord shall we go back:
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: They said, 'Surely unto our Lord we are turning.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: They said: Lo! We are about to return unto our Lord!
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: They replied, "We shall surely return to our Lord.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: They said: verily unto our Lord we are turning.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: They said, ‘Indeed we shall return to our Lord.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: They said: "For us, We are but sent back unto our Lord:
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: They said: "Verily, we are returning to our Lord.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: They replied: 'We shall surely turn to our Lord.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: They said, “It is to our Lord that we will return.”
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: They said, "Indeed, to our Lord we will return.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [7:125] They said, ‘Surely to our Lord, after our death, however it come about, we shall be restored, we shall return, in the Hereafter.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (They) i.e. the wizards (said: Lo! We are about to return unto our Lord!)
